data.text: @kjackson1984 Hello! We can confirm that our colleagues are answering all the incoming calls, however due to high amount of them, there may be some waiting time. Therefore we can invite you to contact us either in evening or morning hours when there are less calls.

This week we are resuming flights to two cities in Croatia - Split and Dubrovnik. In total, we are offering 37 destinations from Riga. See where we are flying now👉https://t.co/VhNsyB2cXN https://t.co/Nzxnr3yoB6

data.text: @henriqueamattos Good morning, Henrique. Thanks for the kind words and compliments, hope you will enjoy (or have already enjoyed) the flight! 😇

Thanks to everyone who participated in #airBalticQuiz! A small majority with 37% got the right answer - our ticket sales on the internet was launched in 2003! 🎫
Here's an excerpt from the article published more than 17 years ago! https://t.co/ldolX2CBAe

@instant_mk Hello! Please be informed that currently we are forced to cancel flights to/from Paris due to government restrictions until 22nd of September. For more information: https://t.co/D5ZQP4sOwG

@AymeBric305 Hello! It depends on the restrictions imposed by the government. In case of any changes with the flights, we or the travel agency will contact all the affected passengers individually. For more information: https://t.co/D5ZQP4sOwG

Greetings to Friday! 👋 Let's go back in time for this week's #airBalticQuiz!
Can you guess in which year airBaltic launched its ticket sales from the company's website via internet? 🖥

“The future winners will be those who are already working on sustainability." Learn more of @airBaltic sustainable development experience by CEO @Gaussm at Riga Aviation Forum: https://t.co/elvYWCHRYI https://t.co/J221qz3YMV
@sedko90 If assistance is needed immediately we can invite you to call us. Thanks for your patience.

@sedko90 Hello! We kindly invite you to check your DMs from the last week where we provided an update on this. Regarding the e-mails, due to high workload it may take much longer time for our colleagues to process them, you should receive an answer within the next weeks.
@raksturs Tieši tā!
@raksturs Labdien! Ja Jums jau ir iegādāta rezervācija pie mums, tās apstiprinājuma e-pastā atradīsiet arī parastā tarifa tālruņa numuru domātu mūsu klientiem. Paldies!

#DidYouKnow that September 2020 marks already more than two years since first-ever airBaltic Training Pilot Academy training flight was performed? While in summer 2018 there were only three Diamond aircraft on Pilot Academy fleet, now there are already eight of them. https://t.co/bEVzQONKmv
@sandbuk @PTACgovLV Kā jau minējām, šāda informācija tiek norādīta apstiprinājuma e-pastā pēc biļetes iegādes.

@sandbuk @PTACgovLV Biļešu tarifs, jeb rezervācijas klase ir cenu līmenis, ko apzīmē ar vienu burtu (piem., A). Rezervācijas klase tiek norādīta apstiprinājuma e-pastā aiz iegādātās biļetes veida (piemēram GREEN classic, A).
@sandbuk @PTACgovLV Sīkākas detaļas: https://t.co/2LkUfdvBnc

@sandbuk @PTACgovLV Labrīt! Pasažieriem, kuri biļetes ir iegādājušies no 10. marta līdz 30. jūnijam ar lidojumu datumu līdz 31. decembrim pakalpojuma maksa par lidojuma maiņu vienai reizei nav jāmaksā. Taču ja sākotnējā biļetes cena vairs nav pieejama, ir jāpiemaksā attiecīgo biļešu tarifu starpība.
@EmmaByr38359856 Hello, Emma. May we kindly ask you to send us more details privately - via direct message? Thank you!

Thanks for participating! Although the split was pretty even, 35% of you got the right answer - airBaltic carried its first 1 millionth passenger in 2001! 👏
Have a wonderful week! https://t.co/Zp79mxPcdV

We're happy to announce that as of today @airBaltic resumes flights between Riga and nine additional destinations. In total, we now connect Riga with 35 destinations across Europe. Read more: https://t.co/CZt7XrNIQa https://t.co/bihPgt7U86

data.text: @KrisjanisValter Labdien! Paldies par ziņu. Patlaban plānots, ka reiss notiks pēc grafika. Ja notiks kādas izmaiņas, pasažierus par to informēsim individuāli (e-pastā vai SMS).
@tomasslakotko1 Aicinām sazināties ar mūsu Rezervāciju departamentu - iespējams, viņi varēs palīdzēt: https://t.co/CHGjV15S1F

urls.title: Visbiežāk uzdotie jautājumi - sazinies ar mums | airBaltic
urls.description: Meklē atbildes uz interesējošiem jautājumiem un atrodi noderīgus kontaktus, lai varētu ar mums sazināties neskaidrību gadījumā. Mēs ar prieku palīdzēsim!

data.text: @tomasslakotko1 Labdien! Paldies par ziņu. Vai varam lūgt precizēt jautājumu?
Another Friday with #airBalticQuiz testing your knowledge about our history!📖Do you remember in which year we carried our first 1 millionth passenger?✈️
@goingfinn Thank you for your explanation. We'd advise to call this late evening or tomorrow's early morning - at these times our phone lines are not that busy.
@goingfinn Hello Chris! Thank you for reaching out to us. Please accept our apologies that our lines are quite busy at the moment. We advise to try to call again in the next hours.

Due to widespread flight changes caused by the Coronavirus crisis, @airBaltic customer service team has been handling a significantly increased volume of inquiries. Last week we received 17 000 incoming calls or 80% more than the year before. Read more: https://t.co/t5Ai0aBkpF https://t.co/3FQkSpnpBQ

@AivarsTennisUK Good evening! We will check on this with our colleagues, however would like to inform that there may be additional schedule adjustments during the next few days due to government restrictions. Thanks for your patience.
@JinsyPraiseHim Hello. May we ask you to send us privately in DM message your booking reference number? Thank you.

Good news for passengers traveling between the Baltics and Sweden! As of September 4th, @airBaltic will resume daily flights between Riga and Stockholm. Flights will be performed on an @Airbus A220-300 aircraft. Read more: https://t.co/N6qTaTIJvX https://t.co/beBZTE6tOU

Great news for passengers traveling from Vilnius! @airBaltic is ready to provide additional connectivity from all three Baltic capitals by launching new direct flights from Vilnius to Kyiv on October 6th! Read more: https://t.co/WudQhCFlly https://t.co/GH20ujca6s

@laPirouetta If you would like to contact us via e-mail, the address is reservations@airbaltic.com, however we would like to inform that due to high amount of incoming e-mails in the queue and workload, it may take up to few weeks for an answer. Once again, thanks for the patience.

@laPirouetta Hi! To check on the current status of your refund request (if it has been purchased on our webpage https://t.co/GfcUoxzmDg) we kindly invite you to contact our Reservations department: https://t.co/UWa844vRzD
Due to high workload it may take longer time to reach us. Thank you!

data.text: @gedusevs Pēc vakardienas Ministru kabineta lēmuma ir iespējamas izmaiņas līdz šim esošajā pieejā reisu atcelšanā (saistībā ar SPKC dzeltenajām un sarkanajām valstīm un to rādītājiem). Tomēr, ja reiss tiks atcelts, par to informēsim visus ietekmētos pasažierus. Paldies par sapratni!
@dsavosin_com Hello Denis! Thank you for reaching out to us. Please know we have already replied to your private message - check your DMs for more details.
@MariosAChrysob Hello, Marios. May we ask you to send us privately more details in Direct Message (such as booking reference number)? Thanks!
@ChangeAgent20 @LSM_eng @Airbus Hello! Not at the moment due to restrictions imposed from the government (because of the high virus activity).
@kSukevics Labdien! Atbilde - DM! Paldies.

#DidYouKnow that average aircraft tire service life is about 500 landings? After that the wheel is removed from the aircraft for a tire change and testing done by a specialized wheel workshop technicians. 🔧 https://t.co/134Zk8Fs84

@anant_1829 Hello! We kindly invite you not to share such sensitive details as booking reference number publicly for your own safety. Regarding the question, we see that you have already requested refund multiple times. Once processed by our team, you will receive the payment within 90 days.

Starting September 2, @airBaltic plans to resume direct flights between Tallinn and Copenhagen in Denmark offering convenient and safe travel opportunities between the two cities. Flights will be performed four times a week on an @Airbus A220-300 aircraft. https://t.co/nw1K5b5RN0

data.text: @gedusevs Labrīt! Lidojumi uz tā dēvētajām sarkanajām valstīm tiek atcelti nedēļas ietvaros attiecīgi SPKC izdotajam sarakstam (kas šobrīd tiek atjaunots katru piektdienu). Sīkākas detaļas: https://t.co/K2XX7FLoRf
@equalitywarrior Hello Sarah! Thank you for reaching out to us. We kindly advise to contact us privately in regards to your questions. Thank you!
@Lielpeteris Labdien! Jau esošajiem kuponiem to derīgumu termiņi pagarināti netiek.

@tomasslakotko1 Labdien! Pēc mūsu rīcībā esošās informācijas, atlidojot no dzeltenās valsts (pieņemot, ka Itālija tāda būtu) Jums būtu jāpavada 14 dienas pašizolācijā. Tāpēc šādā situācijā varam piedāvāt datuma/laika maiņu atpakaļlidojumam: https://t.co/basVOQPrAJ

urls.title: Mainīt lidojumu - Izmaiņas ceļojumā | airBaltic
urls.description: Ir labi būt vienmēr gatavam, tomēr ne vienmēr varam paredzēt savus ceļošanas plānus, un, ja ir gadījies būt mazliet vieglprātīgam, ir arī papildu iespējas.

data.text: @xarly1729 Hi, our apologies for the flight cancellation due to restrictions imposed. Although our lines may be busy at some times due to high amount of incoming calls we kindly invite you to try again a bit later. We thank for your patience and understanding in this extraordinary situation
@vanelloki Thank you for the compliment! 💚

@ENGRRAJI Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. Please accept our apologies for the delayed baggage. We promise to do everything to return it to you as soon as possible. Please know we have also replied to your private message - allow us to continue our conversation there! Thank you!
@janisxyz_ Hello Janis! Thank you for reaching out to us. Our apologies for this situation. We kindly invite to share more details regarding this with us in a DM - we’ll take a look. Thank you!
@WinstonKinley Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. In case of any changes with the flights, please know we’ll contact passengers individually (via e-mail or SMS).
@kaarelveike Hello Kaarel! Thank you for reaching out to us. We'll pass your message to our agents for further investigation. We also advise to contact airport's Lost & Found for more details.
@Dob99207370 Hello! Thank you - please know we've already answered.
@hansa_lv Labdien! Paldies par ziņu. Jā, reisus uz Kopenhāgenu plānojam atsākt no 31. augusta.

data.text: @BizjakMatej Thanks for your guess! Come back next week to find out the correct answer!

Next week we will add to our route map a new direct destination from Vilnius! Can you guess it? 🤔✈️ https://t.co/21wWyIQreZ

@ChimoTcp Hello! If your flight indeed has already cancelled, then not, our apologies. However in some cases system still might send such e-mails, we kindly invite you to ignore them. To double check this, please DM us privately your booking reference number, we will check.

data.text: @bob_from_space Hello! Due to high amount of incoming calls at some points there might be some connection issues or long waiting. We can invite you to try again a bit later or in the evening/morning hours when lines are not as busy. We thank for your patience and understanding.

@TheRashadHasan Hello! First of all, we kindly invite you to delete your tweet as it contains your booking reference number - for your own safety. Regarding the request, although our lines may be busy at times we kindly invite you to contact us again later or during the morning/evening hours.

airBaltic has maintained full gender equality in the number of employees within the company. #DidYouKnow that currently 47% of the workforce within the company are female including more than 40% of airBaltic top management representatives. https://t.co/mKfoxs9iND

As a result of the Coronavirus crisis, revenue and the number of passengers carried by @airBaltic has significantly decreased. According to the financial results for the first six months of 2020, the group suffered loss of EUR 184.8 million. Read more: https://t.co/sDhtqdlEQV https://t.co/TEs9n6LgCg

data.text: As of August 26, @airBaltic resumes direct flights between Vilnius and Munich offering convenient and safe travel opportunities between the two cities. Flights will be performed two times a week on an @Airbus A220-300 aircraft. https://t.co/6oeANZ0Y2c

@adealise @aiwwa Labvakar! Lielās darba noslodzes dēļ atbildes uz e-pastiem un iesniegumiem tiek sniegtas daudz ilgākā laika periodā kā ierasts. Atvainojamies par to - darām visu iespējamo, lai to veiktu pēc iespējas ātrāk. Ja palīdzība ir nepieciešama nekavējoties, varam aicināt mums zvanīt.

data.text:
Good morning! Thanks to everyone who participated in #airBalticQuiz! After a very tight voting 42% of you got the right answer in the end - the flyover was done at 60 metre height!
Have a wonderful week! 👋 https://t.co/4qpTBj7Bx3 https://t.co/uZxNmjqnQC
@w0111_ Hello! May we kindly ask you to send us more details (including booking reference) privately? We'll check! Thank you!
@cadreleyann Hello! May we kindly ask you to send us more details privately? Thank you!

@EmixMaxime Our Call center is open Mon – Fri 7:00 – 22:00, Sat – Sun 8:00 – 20:00 Riga time. And, yes, our colleagues will help you to find the best solution that suits you the most in this situation.

@EmixMaxime Hello, Maxime! Thank you for your message. Our apologies for the flight cancellation due to restrictions. Although our lines may be busy at times we kindly invite you to try again a bit later, in evening or morning hours when the incoming calls are in lower volumes. Thank you!
@fionamarshall11 Hello, Fiona! We have just replied to your direct message. Please check our reply there.

@ANNNAOfficial As advised in our previous tweet, as soon as it is done in the system and we will know that particular flight cannot be performed due to restrictions. Thanks for your understanding in these extraordinary times.
@meganjaytaylor Yes, it is also open during the weekends. For all the times and phone numbers please check this link: https://t.co/UWa844vRzD

urls.title: Frequently asked question about airBaltic
urls.description: We're here to help you! Helpful answers to your questions and useful contacts to find out everything you need about your flight.

data.text: @meganjaytaylor Hello! Our apologies for the flight cancellation due to restrictions imposed because of the high virus activity. Although our lines may be busy at times we kindly invite you to try again a bit later, in the evening or morning hours when the incoming calls are in lower volumes.

@awakeagnese Labdien! Tā nebūs problēma - mūsu mājaslapa iegādājoties biļetes šādu informāciju neprasa (iespējams, ka prasa aģentūras lapa, ja biļetes iegādātas tur?). Ja būs nepieciešama šāda informācija galamērķim, uz kuru dodaties, sistēma šādus datus vaicās reģistrējoties uz reisu.

@M4rk_London Please check our previous tweet. As advised in our screenshot and the webpage, passengers need to self-isolate if the cumulative number of Covid-19 cases per 100,000 inhabitants for last 14 days is over 16.

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

data.text:
Another Friday and another #airBalticQuiz testing your mind, knowledge and sometimes luck! 💡
Last Saturday airBaltic performed a special low pass over Spilve Airport. Can you guess the lowest height at which the flyover was done? ✈️
@M4rk_London @DiamondAircraft https://t.co/C2OgWZX4MW

@M4rk_London Hi! This information has not been changed in our webpage and is still as according to current SPKC guidelines: https://t.co/QIoNeWjHbT
As conditions and requirements from the countries are constantly evolving, we kindly invite all the passengers to double check all the info. https://t.co/40mjc1cBvi

urls.title: Travel regulations | airBaltic
urls.description: Your guide to getting the right information about travel documentation and up-to-date travel requirements.

data.text: @ANNNAOfficial If your flight will be cancelled we (or the travel agency) will inform you about it as soon as it is done in the system. You may also check the current flight status in section "My Booking" on our webpage. Thank you!

@ANNNAOfficial Hello! All flights which can be purchased on our webpage are currently planned. There can be changes of course due to government restrictions. More details about our current policies: https://t.co/D5ZQP4sOwG

Our travel loyalty program @airBaltic Club is in the process of fully integrating the PINS program under one brand, therefore providing even more attractive offers to the customers and focusing on more travel-related partners and airline related rewards. https://t.co/dE5sq26TIo https://t.co/4iAY4J8oiu
